tool_description: 公共交通手段＋徒歩で、ドアtoドアの最適な移動経路・料金を算出することができます。駅の出入り口情報なども合わせて取得できます。　Calculate the optimal door-to-door route and fares by public transportation and walking. In addition, you can get the station entrance/exit informations.
name: NAVITIME Route(totalnavi)
title: NAVITIME Route(totalnavi)

api_list.name: fare_comparison
api_list.description: 定期券を購入した場合と、出社日分を都度購入した場合の運賃を比較します。

required_parameters.name: days
required_parameters.description: Commuting days per month(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 31)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Number of searches.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 10, Default value: 5)
Invalid if \"via_type=optimal\" is specified.

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description:
Departure time.
(ex.2022-04-01T09:00:00)

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description:
Destination.
(maximum number of 10 points)

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description:
Routing mode.
(specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order)

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description:
Output order.
(total_distance: total movement distance, walk_distance: total walking distance, fare: fare, time: required time, transit: transfer times, commuter_pass_price: commuter pass price)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: walk_route
optional_parameters.description: Specify the route to use on foot (avoid_step: routes that avoid stairs, avoid_escalator: routes that avoid stairway and escalator, avoid_rain: routes that is less likely to get wet, babycar: routes that a stroller can get through)

optional_parameters.name: term
optional_parameters.description:
Period-separated range of multiple possible search times.
(Maximum value: 2440, Default value: 1440)
The unit is \"minutes\".

optional_parameters.name: unuse
optional_parameters.description: Public transportation that does not use.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description:
Additional output information.
(railway_calling_at: transfer station information)

optional_parameters.name: payment
optional_parameters.description:
Fare payment method
(ic: IC payment, ticket: ticket payment)

api_list.name: fare_table
api_list.description: Return fare divisions including route search results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://navitime-route-totalnavi.p.rapidapi.com/fare_table"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "navitime-route-totalnavi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://navitime-route-totalnavi.p.rapidapi.com/fare_table"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "navitime-route-totalnavi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: route_transit
api_list.description:
ルート検索（トータルナビ）
電車（航空路線、徒歩含む）を移動手段として、２地点間のルートを探索します。経由地の指定も可能です。

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of searches. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 10, Default value: 5) Invalid if "via_type=optimal" is specified.

optional_parameters.name: walk_route
optional_parameters.description: Specify the route to use on foot (avoid_step: routes that avoid stairs, avoid_escalator: routes that avoid stairway and escalator, avoid_rain: routes that is less likely to get wet, babycar: routes that a stroller can get through)

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description: Routing mode. (specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (railway_calling_at: transfer station information)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: term
optional_parameters.description: Period-separated range of multiple possible search times. (Maximum value: 2440, Default value: 1440) The unit is "minutes".

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: unuse
optional_parameters.description: Public transportation that does not use.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Output order. (total_distance: total movement distance, walk_distance: total walking distance, fare: fare, time: required time, transit: transfer times, commuter_pass_price: commuter pass price)

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description: Destination. (maximum number of 10 points)

api_list.name: shape_transit
api_list.description:
ルート形状取得（トータルナビ）
電車（航空路線、徒歩含む）を移動手段として２地点間のルートを探索し、その結果を形状で取得します。

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of searches. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 10, Default value: 5) Invalid if "via_type=optimal" is specified.

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description: Routing mode. (specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description: Geodetic system of latitude and longitude. (wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Output order. (total_distance: total movement distance, walk_distance: total walking distance, fare: fare, time: required time, transit: transfer times, commuter_pass_price: commuter pass price)

optional_parameters.name: term
optional_parameters.description: Period-separated range of multiple possible search times. (Maximum value: 2440, Default value: 1440) The unit is "minutes".

optional_parameters.name: walk_route
optional_parameters.description: Specify the route to use on foot (avoid_step: routes that avoid stairs, avoid_escalator: routes that avoid stairway and escalator, avoid_rain: routes that is less likely to get wet, babycar: routes that a stroller can get through)

optional_parameters.name: no
optional_parameters.description: Route Number. When multiple routes are being returned, one route must be identified.  Specifies the route number to be output. If not specified, the first route will be selected.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data. (degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: unuse
optional_parameters.description: Public transportation that does not use.

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description: Destination. (maximum number of 10 points)

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format (geojson: GeoJSON format (default), json: JSON format)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description: Additional output information. (transport_shape: public transportation route shape)
